jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
We are mobile infrastructure team at Gojek. We are working on tools to measure, track and improve performance as well as quality of our apps. Optimising build time, reducing memory footprint, reducing battery consumption can be really time consuming if needed to be done on every commit. Same holds true for maintaining quality of code of our 18+ products and various partner platform.

So, the real challenge is not if one can do these work, it's if you can automate it. If you would like to work on building automation infrastructure for mobile that improve quality of apps and bring smiles to mobile engineers, this is the gig you are looking for.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Gojek currently ships more than 10 apps for Consumers, Merchants and Driver Partners. You will be a part of the team which is responsible for automating and improving build and release process
  • Build tools to measure, track and improve mobile performance metrics
  • Defining and automating processes around release engineering, code quality  and application optimisations.
  • Work on the large CI infrastructure involved in catering to a 50+ developer and QA team to enable smoother execution of the Build-Test-Release iterations
  • Work on architecting modular, framework based apps
  • Contribute to the Quality Assurance process to ensure time bound and robust releases
  • Develop the Gojek ecosystem and internal libraries which caters to the multitude of apps
  • Develop tools to ease development for mobile engineers and product owners

• 3 or more years of iOS or Android programming experience
  • Has good understanding of Swift/Kotlin  language
  • In-depth knowledge and understanding of mobile frameworks
  • Knowledge of build tools for respective platforms(xcode build/ gradle/ bazel/ buck)
  • Has a innate desire to automate processes and reduce the amount of grunt work done by a mobile engineer
  • Has fiddled around with CI systems and enjoys optimizing build times
  • Understands the internals of the mobile build and distribution process
  • Excellent attention to details, and focus on Quality over quantity
  • Should be able to capture bottlenecks and improve them without or little supervision
  • Some understanding of Python, Ruby, would be nice to have
